name: rpsblast
usage:
rpsblast [-h] [-help] [-import_search_strategy filename]
  [-export_search_strategy filename] [-db database_name]
  [-dbsize num_letters] [-entrez_query entrez_query] [-query input_file]
  [-out output_file] [-evalue evalue] [-qcov_hsp_perc float_value]
  [-max_hsps int_value] [-xdrop_ungap float_value] [-xdrop_gap float_value]
  [-xdrop_gap_final float_value] [-searchsp int_value]
  [-sum_stats bool_value] [-seg SEG_options] [-soft_masking soft_masking]
  [-culling_limit int_value] [-best_hit_overhang float_value]
  [-best_hit_score_edge float_value] [-subject_besthit]
  [-window_size int_value] [-lcase_masking] [-query_loc range]
  [-parse_deflines] [-outfmt format] [-show_gis]
  [-num_descriptions int_value] [-num_alignments int_value]
  [-line_length line_length] [-html] [-sorthits sort_hits]
  [-sorthsps sort_hsps] [-max_target_seqs num_sequences]
  [-num_threads int_value] [-mt_mode int_value] [-remote]
  [-comp_based_stats compo] [-use_sw_tback] [-version]

options.description: Print USAGE and DESCRIPTION; ignore all other parameters
Print USAGE, DESCRIPTION and ARGUMENTS; ignore all other parameters
Print version number; ignore other arguments
Input file name
Location on the query sequence in 1-based offsets (Format: start-stop)
BLAST database name
Output file name
Expectation value (E) threshold for saving hits
Use composition-based statistics:
alignment view: 0 (Pairwise) or 1 (Query-anchored with identities) or ... or 18 (Organism Report)
Show NCBI GIs in deflines?
Number of database sequences to show one-line descriptions for
Number of database sequences to show alignments for
Line length for formatting alignments
Produce HTML output?
Sorting option for hits:
Sorting option for hps:
Filter query sequence with SEG (Format: 'yes', 'window locut hicut', or
Apply filtering locations as soft masks
Use lower case filtering in query and subject sequence(s)?
Restrict search with the given Entrez query
Percent query coverage per hsp
Set maximum number of HSPs per subject sequence to save for each query
If the query range of a hit is enveloped by that of at least this many
Best Hit algorithm overhang value (recommended value: 0.1)
Best Hit algorithm score edge value (recommended value: 0.1)
Turn on best hit per subject sequence
Maximum number of aligned sequences to keep
Effective length of the database
Effective length of the search space
Use sum statistics
Search strategy to use
File name to record the search strategy used
X-dropoff value (in bits) for ungapped extensions
X-dropoff value (in bits) for preliminary gapped extensions
X-dropoff value (in bits) for final gapped alignment
Multiple hits window size, use 0 to specify 1-hit algorithm
Should the query and subject defline(s) be parsed?
Number of threads to use in RPS BLAST search:
Multi-thread mode to use in RPS BLAST search: {0 (auto) split by database vols, 1 split by queries}
Execute search remotely?
Compute locally optimal Smith-Waterman alignments?
